alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 17 at 10:34PM EST until December 22 at 6:01PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour .One to two inches of rain will cause lowland flooding along East Fork White River near Seymour. River flooding should begin by tomorrow night. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Pasture lands...agricultural lands and several County and State Roads begin to flood. High water isolates a few river cabins. State Road 235 east of Medora and county roads near Shields and Vallonia flood. Roads that begin to flood include 258 east of Cortland...County Road 725 N just north of the gaging site and Ewing Road near Brownstown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to 14.1 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall to 13.9 feet and begin rising again early Sunday afternoon. It will rise to 14.3 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Saturday morning by around 1030 AM EST.
